description: Western Province - Under Sec. 193(1)(GG) of Urban Council Ordinance (Chapter 255) - Regulation for the payment of allowances to the Chairman, Vice Chairman and members of U/C of W/P - Under Sec. 289 of M/C Ordinance read along with Sec. 2 of P/C Act, No. 12 of 1989 - Regulations for the payment of allowances to the Mayor, Deputy Mayor and Members of the M/C of W/P - under Sec. 184 of the P/S Act, No. 15 of 1987 - Regulations for the payment of allowances to the Chairman, Vice Chairman and members of the P/S of W/P
